short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn German verbs using spaced repetition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the world of the German language with Learn German Flashcards! This innovative extension uses the spaced repetition technique to help you effectively memorize and master German verbs.

Key Features:
Interactive Flashcards: Engage with dynamic flashcards that showcase essential German verbs, complete with example sentences and translations.
Spaced Repetition: Enhance your learning experience by using scientifically-proven spaced repetition, ensuring you retain information longer and learn more efficiently.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through flashcards with intuitive controls, including previous and next buttons, making your study sessions smooth and enjoyable.
Customizable Study Sessions: Choose how often you want to revisit words, ranging from 1 day to 1 month, to suit your personal learning pace.
Dark and Light Themes: Study comfortably day or night with adjustable themes that adapt to your browser settings.
Why You Should Install It:
If you’re looking to improve your German vocabulary in a fun and effective way, Learn German Flashcards is your perfect companion. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refresh your knowledge, our extension makes learning engaging and accessible right from your browser.

Join thousands of learners who are successfully mastering German verbs—install Learn German Flashcards today and take the first step toward fluency!
